programme.title: Binibining Marikit
programme.desc: This is the story of Marikit, or Ikit, a hardworking and cheerful Dumagat Remontado tour guide. Raised by her father Gani after being abandoned by her mother Mayumi, Ikit grows up believing that her mother left them for ambition. Their lives take a turn when Rica, a widow, and her daughter Angela arrive in Daraitan, scheming to buy Dumagat lands for a development project.

programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 8
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 6
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. programme.desc: The popular radio and TV show for lonely hearts hosted by DJ Joe D'Mango came to the big screen with two stories of young love based on letters from listeners.

programme.title: Laging Naroon Ka
programme.desc: Opposites attract. And so they say. When the saintly, introverted Quinito meets the candid, out-going Trixie, there are no sparks flying to great heavens. In fact, both think that there’s just no way they can ever click.

programme.title: SPO4 Santiago (Sharpshooter)
programme.desc: Bong Revilla, Jr, starred in this exciting film based on the real-life exploits of SPO4 Jimmy Santiago, SWAT member and sharp-shooter, who was idolized by the masses because he relentlessly went after hostage takers, hold-uppers and all sorts of criminals.

programme.title: Silakbo
programme.desc: A killer-rapist was on the prowl and all of the victims seemed to have had some sort of connection with the maverick NBI agent, Andy, played by Cesar Montano.

programme.title: Muling Buksan ang Puso (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Too much love suffocates and covetousness can breed hate.

programme.title: Paano Tatakasan Ang Bukas?
programme.desc: Desiree and Gilbert are in love but no one seems to believe it.

programme.title: Topo-Topo Barega
programme.desc: \"Topo Topo Barega\", an expression meaning \"All for one, One for all.\" What each earns individually becomes the money of all. The problem of one worries the rest.

programme.title: Anino sa Dilim
programme.desc: Randy (Erwin Montes) and Mitch (Sara Gomez) invites two other couples to spend a relaxing vacation in Randy's rest house. But soon, the vacation turns into a nightmare as the guests turn up dead one after the other.

programme.title: Bakit Manipis Ang Ulap?
programme.desc: When love takes everything you have, will you still fight for it? Chanda Romero and Laurice Guillen will take you to the bitter world of love, family, betrayal and deception.

programme.title: Pacifico Guevarra, Dillinger ng Dose Pares
programme.desc: Young action star Raymart Santiago played one of his most demanding roles as Pacifico Guevarra who called himself Dillinger after the American gangster whom he idolized.

programme.title: Demolisyon
programme.desc: This film presents the struggles of people to have a home of their own and the pain and the anguish they face when they are forced out of their homes and the shanties they thought they owned are demolished.

programme.title: Boy Recto
programme.desc: When a busy street - Claro M. Recto becomes living hell for students and young people, Boy Recto (Ronnie Ricketts) undertake a dangerous rescue mission to save the youngstersfrom attack by various gangsters.

programme.title: M\u0026M, The Incredible Twins
programme.desc: An unfortunate accident separates twins Marcelo (Jimmy Santos) and Marcelino (Herbert Bautista) at birth. Marcelo is adopted by a poor family while Marcelino grows up with their biological parents.

programme.title: Megamol
programme.desc: A rich old lady, who was dying, hired a detective agency to go in search of her long lost granddaughter. Lacking the manpower for the job, janitor Andrew E was passed off as a private detective.

programme.title: Kamagong (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Arnis, the ancient Filipino martial art, took center stage in this coming of age drama wherein a young boy perfected his skills and his idol rediscovered what it takes to be a man.

programme.title: Miss Na Miss Kita (Ang Utol Kong Hoodlum 2)
programme.desc: Together, Robin and Vina, created beautiful music. Together they were in constant danger because of certain people and certain events, which were taking place around them, but they were not aware of.

programme.title: Tatlong Anak, Isang Ama
programme.desc: Set in the city of Olongapo during the last days of the US bases in the Philippines, this is a tale about the life of a musician and his three sons by three different women.

programme.title: Trabaho Lang Dear, Walang Personalan
programme.desc: Former carnival workers Leo and Amanda were trying to make a living by doing all sorts of jobs. From Dyesebel and Babaing Gagamba, Amanda was now a security guard by day and a nightclub bunny by night.

programme.title: Epifanio ang Bilas Ko
programme.desc: This merry romp spoofs the highly successful \"Epimaco Velasco Story\" but instead of a heroic NBI detective with a bumbling private eye in the lead, Epifanio and his brother-in-law heads a detective and security agency.

programme.title: Judge Max Asuncion, Hukom Bitay
programme.desc: Based on the real-life adventures of Judge Max Asuncion who was known as a stickler for the law and as a man who got death threats for breakfast.

programme.title: Ex-Rebel
programme.desc: Concerned with his pregnant wife Saling, rebel leader Ka Leon decides to take advantage of the government's amnesty program to rejoin society. But Ka Leon's past catches up with him.

programme.title: Grease Gun Gang
programme.desc: A renewed ex-convict (Robin Padilla) decided to change his friends’ lifestyle after he came out of the jail.

programme.title: Love at First Sight
programme.desc: Three childhood friends discover their worth and inner strengths, as they experience love and being loved.

programme.title: Takas Sa Impiyerno
programme.desc: Hell is what the residents call their town. It is because Mayor Sebastian (Paquito Diaz) virtually sees the town as his own personal kingdom.

programme.title: Pag-ibig Ko Sa Iyo'y Totoo
programme.desc: A police officer lost his partner and girlfriend on the job. To forget the tragedy, he accepted the offer to become the bodyguard of a rich, young singing star whose father he has rescued from kidnappers.
